name: Micro Wizard Tower Defense
description:
See if you can make it through 50 waves of baddies in this classic, retro-style tower defense game. Summon 4 different types of wizards: Normal, Fire, Ice, and Lightning.  Some enemies are immune to different elements, so some experimentation is required. At the end of each attempt, you will have an opportunity to upgrade your "towers" (wizards) in preparation for the next round. Credits Sound Effects:
  •  8-bit Style Sound Effects by Cabled Mess, @cable_mess,  Website
  • Score and Time by Game Sound Solutions, gamesoundsolutions@gmail.com
Music, Art, Programming, Animation, and Everything Else
  •  Rob at Yellow Leaf Studio, @RobWiseGameDev, rob@yellowleaf.studio
